content.description: A merchant that sells the player items.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: The merchant first spawns on **Moongolow**, and after buying **Glass Vizard** will appear in every map.

fields.name: Items
fields.value:
Golden Egg - 10,000
Glass Vizard - 10,000 (One time)
Bone - 1000
Cherry Bomb - 1000
Carrello - 1000
Celestial Dusting - 1000

content.title: Merchant
